item.description:
Team Trivia is held the second Wednesday of each month from 7 PM - 9 PM at Sky Lounge - this is LIVE bar-trivia, not "I want to be a Millionaire" or a computerized game like you see at some places - If you're not coming because you think trivia is too hard, or not 'your thing', think again; There's some challenge, but it's mostly fun!

Teams are made up of 6 players (or less) - it's more fun to play with multiple teams so we can compete with each other (hint, hint... please join us). If you think of it, bring along ideas for our team's name.

Come early to take advantage of 1/2 price drinks before 7:00pm - most of us order food or share appetizers. Trivia ends promptly at 9:00, but the lounge is still open for those who want to stay later.

Sky Lounge and Bistro is near the Nashua campus of the New Hampshire Community Technical College.
There are two entrances (front and back). We tend to sit at the tables near the back door, but look for a "MEETUP" sign or Just Ask!

Directions:
http://www.skyloungen...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us downstairs toward the back.
item.name: Team Trivia at Sky Lounge
